body_html:
@mrry @aselle Please reopen this issue.

It turns out that this bug is still in place because while computation doesn't fail the number of images processed per second is exactly the same whether there are one or two P4s enabled in the machine which would seem to indicate that only card is being used.

@mrry @aselle  Please reopen this issue.
It turns out that this bug is still in place because while computation doesn't fail the number of images processed per second is exactly the same whether there are one or two P4s enabled in the machine which would seem to indicate that only card is being used.
body:
@mrry @aselle  Please reopen this issue. 

It turns out that this bug is still in place because while computation doesn't fail the number of images processed per second is exactly the same whether there are one or two P4s enabled in the machine which would seem to indicate that only card is being used.
